alert.note: Alert for Inland Nueces; Jim Wells (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 11:43PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Nueces and northwestern Jim Wells Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1142 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tecalote, or 11 miles north of Alice, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alice, Alfred-South La Paloma, Tecalote, Alfred, Westdale and Lake Alice. This includes US Highway 281 between mile markers 656 and 670. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
